name: Forge Sword from Lava
description:
Sword are not only weapons, they are works of art PPE on and get inline to forge the most beautiful swords.

Step by step, your piece of art forming satisfactorily. Lava is there, Pour them into the mould, let it cools down and tadaaa, you are ready to craft shining and colorful swords. Polishing, colouring, make it perfect. Step backward, treat your eyes by looking at your marvelous work, collect money and go for the next one.

with smooth rhythm of vibration effect, forging never been this relaxing!

What are you waiting for. Stop all your headache stuff and forge!
